excerpt: "Health and social care students at the University of Lincoln are learning to operate a robotic seal to help prepare them to use the technology in their work with patients. It is hoped the Â£6,000 \"social robot\" can provide an alternative form of communication for those who may be uncomfortable interacting with other people."
